workflow.name: Generate news digest videos from WordPress to YouTube with Shotstack
workflow.description:
# Daily News Digest Video Generator for YouTube Shorts

## Instalations Instructions

[Youtube Instalation Instructions](https://youtu.be/hfc4BRIh3ZU)

## Overview

This workflow automatically creates and publishes daily news digest videos from WordPress articles to YouTube. It runs every evening at 7 PM, compiling the day's top stories from a news portal into a professionally formatted vertical video (1080x1920px) optimized for social media platforms like YouTube Shorts.

---

## What It Does

### 1. **üïê Scheduled Trigger**
- Runs automatically every day at **19:00 (7 PM)**

### 2. **üì∞ Fetches Today's Articles**
- Retrieves all published WordPress posts from the current day

### 3. **‚úÖ Validates Content**
- Ensures there are **at least 3 articles** before proceeding

### 4. **üé¨ Video Detection**
- Scans article content HTML for embedded videos
- Extracts MP4 URLs from WordPress video players
- Parses `wp-playlist-script` JSON data
- Falls back to `<video>` and `<source>` tag detection

### 5. **üßπ Data Processing**
- **Extracts** article titles, links, and featured media IDs
- **Decodes HTML entities**: Converts `–` to `‚Äì`, `"` to `"`, etc.
- **Fetches featured images** from WordPress Media API
- **Assigns default images** for articles without featured media
- **Calculates reading time** per article (3-7 seconds based on word count)
- **Cleans text**: Removes HTML tags and normalizes whitespace

### 6. **üé• Video Generation** (via Shotstack API)

#### Intro Slide (3 seconds)
- Black background
- Large logo (centered)
- Title on center
- Current date in DD-MM-YYYY format

#### News Slides (3-7 seconds each)
Each article is displayed with:
- **Background**: Video (if available) or featured image, cropped to fit
- **Dark overlay**: 40% opacity black layer for text readability
- **Article headline**: Large white text at top
- **Small logo**: Top-right corner
- **Pagination counter**: Bottom-right white badge (e.g., "1 / 22")
- **CTA button**: Centered CTA
- **Background music**: Subtle looped audio track
- **Transitions**: Smooth fade in/out between slides

#### Outro Slide (3 seconds)
- Identical to intro slide
- Provides clean ending to the video

### 7. **‚è≥ Processing Wait**
- Waits **30 seconds** for Shotstack to render the video
- Polls Shotstack API to verify video completion

### 8. **üì• Download Video**
- Retrieves the finished MP4 file from Shotstack
- Downloads video data for YouTube upload

### 9. **üì§ YouTube Upload**
Automatically uploads to YouTube with:
- **Title**: `"Daily Digest - [Day] [Weekday], [Year]"`
- **Description**: Same as title
- **Category**: News & Politics
- **Made for kids**: Yes
- **Tags**: `dailydigest`

---

## ‚ú® Key Features

### Intelligent Content Handling
- ‚úÖ Automatic video/image detection and intelligent media selection
- ‚úÖ Dynamic reading time calculation for optimal viewer engagement
- ‚úÖ HTML entity cleaning for proper text display (WordPress compatibility)
- ‚úÖ Fallback default images for articles without media
- ‚úÖ Video background support with automatic muting

### Professional Video Production
- ‚úÖ Vertical format optimized for mobile viewing (1080x1920px)
- ‚úÖ Professional branding with logos and consistent styling
- ‚úÖ Smooth fade transitions between slides
- ‚úÖ Background music with looping support
- ‚úÖ Dynamic pagination counters
- ‚úÖ Call-to-action buttons for engagement

### Customization
- ‚úÖ Centralized variables for easy branding updates
- ‚úÖ Configurable logos, colors, and text
- ‚úÖ Adjustable reading time calculation
- ‚úÖ Flexible date formatting
- ‚úÖ Customizable audio track

## üéØ Use Cases

Perfect for:
- üì∞ **News websites** wanting to repurpose daily articles
- üì± **Media outlets** creating social media content
- üé• **Content creators** automating video production
- üîÑ **Publishers** maximizing content distribution
- üìä **Marketing teams** driving traffic from social platforms

---

## üîß Customization Options

### Easy Changes
- Update logos by changing `logo_big` and `logo_small` URLs
- Modify branding colors via `button_bg_color` variable
- Adjust button text with `button_text` variable
- Change video title with `daily_digest_text` variable
- Update background music by replacing audio URL

### Advanced Customization
- Adjust reading time formula in `calculateReadingTime()` function
- Modify date format in `getRomanianDate()` function
- Change video dimensions (currently 1080x1920)
- Update font family and sizes
- Adjust overlay opacity and colors
- Modify transition effects

---

## üìã Prerequisites

### Required Credentials
1. **WordPress API** - Access your WordPress site
2. **Shotstack API** - API key for video rendering (Stage environment)
3. **YouTube OAuth2** - Authenticated YouTube account for uploads

nodes.name: Merge image url with article details

parameters.content:
## How it works
The workflow runs every evening. It scans all news articles published that day on your website, detects any embedded videos, and selects the featured image, or a default one if none is available. It then generates a Daily Digest video using Shotstack.com and automatically uploads it to your YouTube channel as a Short. The final video displays a list of your articles, each shown with its featured image or background video.


## Setup steps
We assume you are using a WordPress based news website.

- Add your credentials for WordPress, Shotstack, and YouTube.

- Configure the workflow by editing the Config Variables node, where you can set your main logo, corner logo, button color, title, default image URL, and sound URL.

## Configure workflow & retrieve articles

This section sets the default variables, fetches all articles published today, and checks whether any video is present.

## Get background image URL

This section retrieves the image URL from WordPress, or assigns the default image if none is available.

## Generate video

This section prepares the JSON payload for Shotstack based on their API, submits the rendering request, and checks every 30 seconds until the video is ready, then retrieves the download URL.

## Submits Short

This node uploads the generated Short to YouTube.

I design custom automations, integrate multiple platforms, and optimize complex workflows for scalability and reliability.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
